title: São Vicente (Municipal Court of)
body: The Municipal Court of São Vicente, with its headquarters in the parish and town of the same name, was created by decree on October 24, 1931, and comprises the parishes of São Vicente, Ponta Delgada, and Boaventura, which constitute the respective municipality. In 1926, the São Vicente district was abolished, which had been established by decree on November 12, 1875, and its installation took place on November 16, 1876.

1931: Creation of the Municipal Court of São Vicente
1926: Abolition of the São Vicente district
1875: Establishment of the São Vicente district
